name: Folk of Leng
description: The Folk of Leng is a Medium humanoid known for its cunning and mystical capabilities, enhanced by its robust hit points and formidable Dexterity and Charisma.
memorable: Its unique ability to regenerate and resurrect after death unless killed with radiant damage makes it a challenging foe.
goals: The Folk of Leng seeks to manipulate and deceive others, using its magical abilities and combat skills.
relations: The Folk of Leng is connected to the mystical land of Leng and may interact with various magic-using creatures.
environment: It can be found in various environments but particularly thrives in places where it can manipulate others, such as urban areas or mystical realms.
strengths: It is immune to necrotic damage and resistant to cold, making it durable against several types of attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can prevent it from regenerating and resurrecting.
attacks: Attacks include a scimitar strike dealing slashing plus psychic damage, a ranged psychic bolt, and net attacks that restrain and poison.
most_powerful_ability: Its Leng Rejuvenation ability allows it to resurrect after death unless specific conditions, such as radiant damage, are met.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 15, reflecting its heightened awareness.
skills: Skilled in Arcana, Deception, and has good perception.
additional_information: Can cast spells without material components using Charisma.
Ethereal Sight allows it to see into the Ethereal Plane.
Makes melee attacks magical and adds psychic damage.
Can shift between the Material and Ethereal Plane as a bonus action.
Regenerates hit points each turn unless it takes specific damage.
spellcasting: Can cast minor spells at will and has access to disguise self and suggestion three times per day.
test_queries: humanoid with psychic abilities and regeneration
stealthy monster that can attack from the ethereal plane
creature that can manipulate and deceive with magic
mystical being immune to necrotic damage
monster that can see into the ethereal plane
